Episodes.Title: Feeling Good
Episodes.Plot: The aunties spend time with Ngaro Nankivell and her whanau.  Ngaro is a brave and stoic woman at the end of her grueling chemotherapy treatment for breast cancer.  The Aunty?s help her find ways to support Ngaro and help her to ?feel good?.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Healthy and Happy

Episodes.Title: Raising Boys
Episodes.Plot: Aunty Amiria visits Tiani, who is worried about raising her nephew in a whare full of wahine. With a little bit of help, Tiani discovers that she already has the tools to ensure he is well looked after.

Episodes.Plot: In a look back over the series, Aunties Amiria, Ata and Ella catch up with some of the whanau at the Aunties studio whare.
